description: Enjoy this twist on a Turkish pide that uses beef sausage on a tangy tomato base. This quick and easy dinner recipe is sure to become a regular.
name: Cheat's Beef Sausage Pides Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine yoghurt and mint in a bowl. Season with pepper. Dollop minted yoghurt over pides, top with spinach and serve with lemon wedges.
